name: places/ChIJo9oWc4hZwokRSni3F7fkua4
adrFormatAddress: 447 Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: My fiance (now wife) and I chose Sangalong as our DJ/MC for our wedding at the Foundry in LIC and were so lucky to have worked with Jay and Kenny there. Not only were they extremely professional, but walked through what we could expect on our wedding date and reassured us of what would happen. Kenny as a MC was quick and to the point and worked the crowd well for each aspect of the wedding. Jay was an excellent DJ and read the room so well, people got dancing without needing to transition to a dance time. All of our guests had raving reviews about the song selection and received such great feedback about the environment at our wedding, largely credited to Sangalong. We're truly so lucky to have stumbled upon them for our wedding and we couldn't have asked for more!

originalText.text: Kenny and Jay were amazing at our wedding! They kept the party going with their high energy and fun games. All the music we requested were played and their technician made sure everything cued up perfectly.  When you hire these guys, you get a peace of mind that everything is going to work out great!

originalText.text: When my now-wife and I were looking for a MC/DJ for our bilingual wedding, we had a very specific wishlist that we needed. From our very first initial meeting in 2019, we were really lucky and impressed with everything Sang Along brought to our wedding! Jay & Kenny handled every meeting professionally and walked us through our questions & made sure that we had a great wedding. They were so easy to work with - it was like talking to friends - even when we had to reschedule multiple times due to COVID. During the actual wedding, people were raving about the songs that got a traditional asian group dancing (awesome playlist & DJ'ing Jay!!). Kenny, you were incredible from the ceremony all the way through to the games; your perfect Chinese & English ensured that our guests knew what's going on. Everyone was super excited and pleased with how things turned out. THANK YOU and the crew for making our big day so special - couldn't have done it without you. If you're debating about this team, please reach out now. You will NOT regret it and will have a wonderful wedding that people will be talking about for a while.
